name: Plant Legions
description:
"Plant Legions" —A casual tower defense game of plants vs beasties!

You will have to strategically plan and plant to defend against the environmental threat of goblins and orcs!

Earn gold and upgrade your towers, unlock more defense positions and strange technology!

Together with your Plantorians, defend the luscious Goldfruit that is keeping Earth alive. Come and join in this glorious mission with the heroic plants!

Gameplay:
1. Command your Plantorians and weave a web of defense to defeat the goblins and orcs to earn gold.
2. Combine and meld together your Plantorians to upgrade them! By strategically placing the 4 types of towers, not a single soul can live through the healthy barrage!
3. Defeat unique stage bosses to unlock rare Plantorians and upgrade materials!
4. The sky's the limit! Go through the endless stages and face even more challenging enemies, and upgrade even more fearsome technology!
